i1.name: Mana Barrier
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, when '''Blitzcrank''' is damaged to {{as|{{sti|health|30% of his '''maximum''' health}}}}, a {{tip|shield}} is automatically generated that is equal to {{sti|mana|{{as|30% of '''maximum''' mana|mana}}}}, lasting up to 10 seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Periodically, when Blitzcrank is damaged to 30% of his maximum health, a shield is automatically generated that is equal to 30% of maximum mana, lasting up to 10 seconds.
i1.notes:
* The shield will absorb the portion of incoming damage that would reduce health past 30%.
** ''Mana Barrier'' will trigger after {{ri|Nullifying Orb}} and {{ii|Phantom Dancer}} if '''Blitzcrank's''' takes damage while above 30% health, and they will trigger simultaneously when '''Blitzcrank''' takes damage while below 30% health.
** ''Mana Barrier'' will trigger simultaneously with {{ii|Hexdrinker}} or {{ii|Maw of Malmortius}} if '''Blitzcrank's''' takes damage while above 30%, and trigger before them when '''Blitzcrank''' takes damage while below 30% health.

q1.name: Rocket Grab
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Blitzcrank''' fires the right hand in the target direction that catches the first enemy struck, dealing {{as|magic damage}} while {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them to '''Blitzcrank''', then {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
'''''Blitzcrank''' is unable to move or attack while Rocket Grab is in flight.''
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Blitzcrank fires the right hand in the target direction that catches the first enemy struck, dealing magic damage while pulling them to Blitzcrank, then stunning them for 0.5 seconds.Blitzcrank is unable to move or attack while Rocket Grab is in flight.
q1.notes:
* The target is {{tip|sight|revealed}} while it is being {{tip|airborne|pulled}}.
* The target's destination stops in front of '''Blitzcrank'''. If static terrain obscures this area, the target will stop prematurely before crossing it.
* '''Blitzcrank''' will be ordered to [[basic attack]] the target once the target arrives.
* If '''Blitzcrank''' is {{tip|airborne|displaced}} during the grab, the target will still be pulled to the old location.
** However if '''Blitzcrank''' is displaced by specifically {{ai|Fate's Call|Kalista}}, the target will be pulled to the new location.

w1.name: Overdrive
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Blitzcrank''' shifts into overdrive, gaining {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds and {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays to 10% after {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
When ''Overdrive'' ends, '''Blitzcrank''' is {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 30% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Blitzcrank shifts into overdrive, gaining bonus attack speed for 5 seconds and bonus movement speed that decays to 10% after 2.5 seconds.When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank is slowed by 30% for 1.5 seconds.
w1.notes: * The self-slow is affected by {{tip|slow resist}} and {{tip|Tenacity}}.

effects.str:
• Attack Speed:
  • Movement Speed:

e1.name: Power Fist
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Blitzcrank's''' next [[basic attack]] within 5 seconds becomes {{tip|unstoppable basic attack|unstoppable}}, deals {{as|100% AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocks up}} the target for 1 second.
''Power Fist'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Blitzcrank's''' basic attack timer.
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Blitzcrank's next basic attack within 5 seconds becomes unstoppable, deals 100% AD bonus physical damage and knocks up the target for 1 second.Power Fist resets Blitzcrank's basic attack timer.
e1.notes:
* The {{tip|airborne|knockup}} is applied even if the attack is {{tip|dodge|dodged}} or {{tip|blind|missed}}.
** It is not applied if it is {{tip|block|blocked}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} prevents the {{tip|airborne|knockup}} but not the damage.
* The target is displaced a short distance during the {{tip|airborne|knockup}} in a random direction.

r1.name: Static Field
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While ''Static Field'' is available, '''Blitzcrank's''' basic attacks apply a mark that [[stack]]s up to 3 times. After every 1 second, 1 mark is consumed to deal {{as|magic damage}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Blitzcrank''' detonates a static field, destroying damage-mitigating {{tip|shield|shields}} of nearby enemies before dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|silence|silencing}} them for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml: Passive: While Static Field is available, Blitzcrank's basic attacks apply a mark that stacks up to 3 times. After every 1 second, 1 mark is consumed to deal magic damage.Active: Blitzcrank detonates a static field, destroying damage-mitigating shields of nearby enemies before dealing magic damage and silencing them for 0.5 seconds.
r1.notes:
* '''Blitzcrank's''' attacks do not have to deal damage to apply the mark.
* The mark will be consumed even if the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}.
* The lightning bolts deal {{tip|spell damage}} while the static field applies {{tip|area damage}}.
* Even if ''Static Field'' is blocked by a {{tip|spell shield}}, it will still destroy any existing damage {{tip|shield|shields}} on the target.
* ''Static Field'' is always cast from the original casting position.
** The visual effects will appear from wherever '''Blitzcrank''' is at the end of the cast time.{{bug}}

effects.str: • Bolt Magic Damage: (+ 30% AP)
• Detonation Magic Damage: (+ 100% AP)
